entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 5:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNE 46 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then northwest 60 gusting to 90 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
